item.title: About
item.description: I’m currently a final-year undergraduate student in the School of Computer Science and Technology, @Beijing Institute of Technology, and a research intern @HKU NLP, supervised by Tao Yu. Also I’m an incoming master @Fudan DISC, will be supervised by Zhongyu Wei. Previously, I joined in the NLP group in BIT, advised by Xin Xin. I come from Chongqing, China, a beautiful city â€‹â€‹surrounded by mountains and rivers. My main research interest is Natural Language Processing.
